Flub.Name: Blend
Flub.Description: Blends the values of the two inputs.

Flub.Name: Add
Flub.Description: Adds Input2 to Input1.

Flub.Name: Screen
Flub.Description: Adds Input2 to Input1 without overexposing the output.

Flub.Name: Subtract
Flub.Description: Subtracts Input2 from Input1.

Flub.Name: Multiply
Flub.Description: Multiplies Input1 by Input2.

Flub.Name: Divide
Flub.Description: Divides Input1 by Input2.

Flub.Name: Max
Flub.Description: Selects the higher of the two inputs.

Flub.Name: Min
Flub.Description: Selects the lower of the two inputs.

Flub.Name: SqRt
Flub.Description: The square root of the two combined terrains.

Flub.Name: Power
Flub.Description: Uses Input2 to create exponents of Input1.

Flub.Name: Difference
Flub.Description: Creates the difference of the two inputs.

Flub.Name: Insert
Flub.Description: Insert relatively flat and isolated shapes into an uneven surface, such as sand dunes, while retaining the flatness of the rocks..

Flub.Name: Embed
Flub.Description: Embed any shape into any other terrain.

Flub.Name: Ratio
Flub.Description: The ratio applied to the selected method.

Flub.Name: Swap Inputs
Flub.Description: Switches the two inputs.

Flub.Name: Separation Mask
Flub.Description: When enabled, creates a separation mask that separates the original elements from the combined output.

Flub.Name: Clamp Output
Flub.Description: Clamp the output between 0..1 values, removing any excess spikes or out-of-bound values.

Flub.Name: Abs
Flub.Description: When enabled, any value above 0.0 is forced to become 1.0. This is useful for creating hard boundaries out of masks.

Flub.Name: Threshold
Flub.Description: When abs is enabled, it is the threshold for the Abs operation. When Insert mode is active, it responds to the threshold to which insertion should take place.

Flub.Name: Flatten
Flub.Description: The amount of flattening the local terrain must go through to insert an uneven shape. Only available in Insert mode.

Flub.Name: Threshold
Flub.Description: The extent of insertion or embedding. Use it to multiply the Ratio value. Only available in Insert or mode.
